notification.content:
"Blessing of the Mystic Mountain" Login Bonus!

The mines of the mystic mountain overflow with Mythril! To show our gratitude for everyone's efforts in restoring the records, we'll be giving a special Daily Login Bonus!

Receive 1 Mythril every day!
Available from 5:00 PM 7/13 PST (1:00 AM 7/14 UTC) until 4:59 PM 8/12 PST (12:59 AM 8/13 UTC)

Just log in each day to claim the Mythril!
notification.title: Blessing of the Mystic Mountain

notification.content:
5★ Magistral Rod (X) added to Relic Draw
Magistral Rod (X) and Official Ball (X) have a drop rate bonus through 4:59 PM 7/25 PST (12:59 AM 7/26 UTC)!

Magistral Rod (X)
Type: Rod
Soul Break: The Sending (Yuna)
Effect: Deal magic holy damage to all targets.

Official Ball (X)
Type: Blitzball
Soul Break: Status Reels (Wakka)
Effect: Deal damage to one target and reduce its Defense and Resistance.

The Relic Synergy from FINAL FANTASY X equipment will also give your party a leg up during the ongoing Marriage of Convenience event!
Use the Soul Break The Sending to smite down your foes!


5★ FINAL FANTASY X Equipment Drop Rate Bonus!Emerald Bracer (X), Soldier’s Sabre (X), Monk Robe (X), Heat Lance (X), and Emerald Shield (X) all have drop rate bonuses!

Use the Shared Soul Breaks found on many of these items to help you through the ongoing Marriage of Convenience event!
notification.title: New Relic Draw Drops

notification.content:
Restore Yuna’s Hero Record!The Marriage of Convenience challenge event launched at 5:00 PM 7/15 PST (1:00 AM 7/16 UTC)!

Duration5:00 PM 7/15 PST (1:00 AM 7/16 UTC) to 4:59 PM 7/25 PST (12:59 AM 7/26 UTC)

RewardsRecruit Yuna to your party.
Complete the Elite Dungeons to get a Yuna Memory Crystal.
Use Yuna’s Memory Crystal to break her level cap!

See Event Rules for more details.
notification.title: New Event Underway

notification.content:
The SeeD Exam Homecoming event begins at 5:00 PM 7/21 PST (1:00 AM 7/22 UTC)!

Two new SeeD members appear in this new event! Can you survive the perils of the SeeD field exam?

FINAL FANTASY VIII characters and equipment will be invaluable in The SeeD Exam Homecoming event.
Be prepared! Recruit new characters in Classic Dungeons and use Daily Dungeons to upgrade your party and abilities now!
notification.title: SeeD Exam Homecoming Coming Soon!

notification.content:
Bonus Battles in Marriage of Convenience! Bonus Battles have been added to the ongoing Marriage of Convenience event!

Unlock Bonus Battles by completing all of the event Elite Dungeons.
Survive the gauntlet of boss battles to get the new Ixion ability!

And another battle awaits after the Bonus Battles!
Are you ready for the ultimate challenge?


See Event Rules for more details.
notification.title: Bonus Battles Added

notification.content:
This is an important notice for players of SQUARE ENIX games on the iOS platform.

Apple has officially announced the release of its iOS 9 Beta. Please note that if you install the iOS 9 Beta on your device, SQUARE ENIX apps may encounter malfunctions such as performance errors or loss of data, or perhaps even fail to deliver in-game currency purchased with real money.

Since our apps are not compatible with the iOS 9 Beta at this time, we regret we are unable to provide customer support for any trouble arising from installation of this OS (including, but not limited to, data recovery or undelivered in-game currencies). Please be aware that SQUARE ENIX will not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, in any way for loss or damages of any kind incurred by installing or using the iOS 9 Beta with relation to SQUARE ENIX apps.

For further information, please also see Apple's "Frequently Asked Questions."
https://beta.apple.com/sp/en/betaprogram/faq
notification.title: Apple iOS 9 Beta Notice
